Title: Expands universal pre-kindergarten in public schools
Summary: Expands universal pre-kindergarten in public schools.
LawCode: Amd §§3602-e & 3602-ee, Ed L; amd Part CC §2, Chap 56 of 2014
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to universal pre-kindergarten aid; and to amend part CC of chapter 56 of the laws of 2014, amending the education law relating to universal full-day pre-kindergarten, in relation to providing for the repeal of such provisions
